# Rishabh Singh - Software Engineer Portfolio

> Interactive terminal-style portfolio showcasing my professional journey, technical skills, and projects

## About

Rishabh Singh is a Software Engineer currently working as SDE 2 at Inka, specializing in building Conversational AI Agents and integrating AI into existing products. Based in Mumbai, India, Rishabh started programming at age 14, creating simple games, which evolved into a passion for building digital experiences including apps, websites, and systems.

With 4+ years of professional experience, Rishabh focuses on crafting polished, high-quality software solutions. His expertise spans full-stack development, system architecture, and performance optimization, with a current focus on Conversational AI and AI-powered product enhancements.

## Professional Experience

### Software Engineer II (SDE 2) - Inka
- **Duration**: February 2025 - Present
- **Location**: Thane, India (Remote)
- **Focus**: Insurance empowered by AI & Data
- **Responsibilities**: Full-stack development, system architecture and design, performance optimization and scaling, assisting junior developers, driving healthy technical culture, code review and quality assurance
- **Technologies**: JavaScript, Python, Docker, LLMs, AWS, GCP

### Founding Engineer - SSingularity Technologies
- **Duration**: January 2024 - February 2025
- **Location**: Thane, India (WFO)
- **Focus**: Empowering businesses with cutting-edge AI solutions
- **Responsibilities**: All-round engineering (Web, Mobile, Backend, DevOps), system architecture and design, performance optimization and scaling, leading the entire engineering team, driving healthy technical culture
- **Technologies**: JavaScript, Python, Ruby, C#, PHP, Docker, LLMs, AWS, Azure, Digital Ocean

### Tech Intern - SSingularity Technologies
- **Duration**: May 2021 - January 2024
- **Location**: Thane, India (Hybrid)
- **Focus**: Building scalable applications and services
- **Technologies**: JavaScript, Python, Ruby, C#, PHP, Docker, LLMs, AWS, Azure, Digital Ocean

## Projects

### Vaani - Conversational AI Agent
Led the development of a new feature/product for IIR (Inka Insurance Report) Dashboard. Vaani is a Conversational AI Agent that helps users navigate, understand, and get a better understanding of the report dashboard.
- **Technologies**: Python, Docker, LLMs
- **Role**: Lead Developer
- **Company**: Inka Insurance

### OutCallerAI
Built the entire product from scratch. An AI-powered outbound caller that engages customers in human-like conversations and helps businesses automate their outreach efforts.
- **Technologies**: React, Next.js, Python (FastAPI), Docker, LLMs, PostgreSQL, Redis, Twilio, Plivo
- **Role**: Lead Developer, Manager, Product Owner
- **Company**: SSingularity Technologies (2025)

### OutRiskAI
Built the entire product from scratch. Provides comprehensive risk analysis, summarization, and access to expert legal assistance.
- **Technologies**: React, Next.js, Python (FastAPI), Docker, LLMs, PostgreSQL, Redis
- **Role**: Lead Developer, Manager, Product Owner
- **Company**: SSingularity Technologies (2024-2025)

### Hiranandani Foundation School App
Mobile app that allows parents to easily access all course work, events, attendance records, fees information and more.
- **Technologies**: React, React Native
- **Scale**: 2,000+ monthly active users
- **Role**: Lead Developer, Manager, Product Owner
- **Company**: SSingularity Technologies (2024-2025)

### Tata Embrace Lite
A micro LMS integrated with the existing LMS of the entire Tata Group HR. Integration had to be done on a legacy unmaintained system.
- **Technologies**: React, ASP.NET, Azure, Azure DevOps
- **Scale**: Used by the entire Tata Group (100,000+ users)
- **Role**: Lead Developer, Manager, Product Owner
- **Company**: SSingularity Technologies (2023-2025)

### Deloitte x Quodeck Integration Middleware
A middleware application that allows Quodeck's learning platform to integrate with Deloitte's LMS. Handled millions of records seamlessly.
- **Technologies**: ASP.NET Core, MS-SQL, Azure, Microservices
- **Scale**: Millions of records
- **Role**: Lead Developer, Manager, Product Owner
- **Company**: SSingularity Technologies (2022-2025)

## Website Features

This portfolio website is an interactive terminal emulator that allows visitors to explore information through command-line interface. Available commands include:
- `help` - Show available commands
- `about` - Learn more about Rishabh
- `contact` - Get contact information
- `projects` - View projects and repositories
- `blogs` - Read latest blog posts
- `skills` - View technical skills
- `experience` - See work experience
- `social` - Links to social profiles
- `resume` - Download resume
- `theme [name]` - Change terminal theme

## Additional Information

- Built scalable applications serving hundreds of thousands of users
- Passionate about creating polished, high-quality software
- Currently focused on Conversational AI and AI-powered product enhancements
- Active blogger sharing technical knowledge on Medium
- Strong advocate for code quality and best practices
